languages.text: Castigator's description for character generation screen

traits.locale_text: Castigator's description for character generation screen

languages.text: Приказ Арбитес — это голос Лекс Империалис. Ваш отряд занимался взысканием десятины с должников и подавлением сопутствующего сопротивления. Ваши громогласные приказы наполнены нерушимой уверенностью и отработаны годами. Их исполняют не только ваши соратники, но и нарушители, неспособные противиться вашей воле. Сотни преступников падали на колени и умоляли о пощаде услышав ваше громогласное повеление сдаться. Всех их ожидало быстрое и жестокое правосудие.

An Arbitrator's order is the voice of the Lex Imperialis. Your squad was in charge of collecting the sacred tithe from debtors and suppressing any resistance shown. Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making allies and offenders alike comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.
languages.original_text: Приказ Арбитес — это голос Лекс Империалис. Ваш отряд занимался взысканием десятины с должников и подавлением сопутствующего сопротивления. Ваши громогласные приказы наполнены нерушимой уверенностью и отработаны годами. Их исполняют не только ваши соратники, но и нарушители, неспособные противиться вашей воле. Сотни преступников падали на колени и умоляли о пощаде услышав ваше громогласное повеление сдаться. Всех их ожидало быстрое и жестокое правосудие.

traits.locale_text: An Arbitrator's order is the voice of the Lex Imperialis. Your squad was in charge of collecting the sacred tithe from debtors and suppressing any resistance shown. Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making both allies and offenders comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making both allies and offenders comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making allies and offenders alike comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

languages.text: アービトレイターの命令は、すなわちレックス・インペリアの声である。あなたの部隊は、債務者から聖なる租税を徴収し、あらゆる抵抗を鎮圧する任務を担っていた。あなたの命令には、長年の奉職によって磨かれた揺るぎない威厳がこもり、味方も違反者も従わざるを得ない。あなたが意志を言葉にした瞬間、誰一人としてそれに抗うことなどできないのだ。降伏を命じるその轟く声を前に、これまでに数百の犯罪者たちが膝をつき、慈悲を乞うた。だが彼らは皆、迅速かつ容赦ない裁きを受けたのである。
languages.original_text: An Arbitrator's order is the voice of the Lex Imperialis. Your squad was in charge of collecting the sacred tithe from debtors and suppressing any resistance shown. Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making allies and offenders alike comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターの命令は、すなわちレックス・インペリアの声である。あなたの部隊は、債務者から聖なる租税を徴収し、あらゆる抵抗を鎮圧する任務を担っていた。あなたの命令には、長年の奉職によって磨かれた揺るぎない威厳がこもり、味方も違反者も従わざるを得ない。あなたが意志を言葉にした瞬間、誰一人としてそれに抗うことなどできないのだ。降伏を命じるその轟く声を前に、これまでに数百の犯罪者たちが膝をつき、慈悲を乞うた。だが彼らは皆、迅速かつ容赦ない裁きを受けたのである。

languages.text: Der Befehl eines Arbitrators ist die Stimme des Lex Imperia. Dein Trupp war dafür verantwortlich, den heiligen Zehnt von Schuldnern einzutreiben und jeden Widerstand niederzuschlagen. Deine Befehle dröhnen vor unerschütterlichem Selbstbewusstsein, durch jahrelangen Dienst gestählt. Verbündete und Sünder gehorchen dir gleichermaßen, denn niemand wagt es zu protestieren, wenn du deinen Willen in Worte fasst. Auf deinen ohrenbetäubenden Befehl hin, sich zu ergeben, sind Hunderte von Verbrechern auf die Knie gefallen und haben um Gnade gewinselt. Sie alle wurden schnell und hart bestraft.
languages.original_text: An Arbitrator's order is the voice of the Lex Imperialis. Your squad was in charge of collecting the sacred tithe from debtors and suppressing any resistance shown. Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making allies and offenders alike comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

traits.locale_text: Der Befehl eines Arbitrators ist die Stimme des Lex Imperia. Dein Trupp war dafür verantwortlich, den heiligen Zehnt von Schuldnern einzutreiben und jeden Widerstand niederzuschlagen. Deine Befehle dröhnen vor unerschütterlichem Selbstbewusstsein, durch jahrelangen Dienst gestählt. Verbündete und Sünder gehorchen dir gleichermaßen, denn niemand wagt es zu protestieren, wenn du deinen Willen in Worte fasst. Auf deinen ohrenbetäubenden Befehl hin, sich zu ergeben, sind Hunderte von Verbrechern auf die Knie gefallen und haben um Gnade gewinselt. Sie alle wurden schnell und hart bestraft.

languages.text: À travers ses ordres, l'arbitrator donne une voix à la Lex Imperialis. Votre escouade était chargée de prélever la dîme sacrée, en se tenant prête à mater toute forme de résistance. Lorsque vos commandements retentissent, empreintes d'une assurance inébranlable forgée par des années de service, les alliés comme les contrevenants s'exécutent, car nul n'ose s'opposer à l'expression de votre volonté. Des centaines de criminels sont tombés à genoux en suppliant d'être épargnés dès que vous leur avez sommé de capituler. Tous ont reçu un jugement prompt et sévère.
languages.original_text: An Arbitrator's order is the voice of the Lex Imperialis. Your squad was in charge of collecting the sacred tithe from debtors and suppressing any resistance shown. Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making allies and offenders alike comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

traits.locale_text: À travers ses ordres, l'arbitrator donne une voix à la Lex Imperialis. Votre escouade était chargée de prélever la dîme sacrée, en se tenant prête à mater toute forme de résistance. Lorsque vos commandements retentissent, empreintes d'une assurance inébranlable forgée par des années de service, les alliés comme les contrevenants s'exécutent, car nul n'ose s'opposer à l'expression de votre volonté. Des centaines de criminels sont tombés à genoux en suppliant d'être épargnés dès que vous leur avez sommé de capituler. Tous ont reçu un jugement prompt et sévère.

languages.text: La orden de un Arbitrator es la voz de la Lex Imperialis. Tu escuadra se encargaba de cobrar el sagrado diezmo a los deudores y de sofocar toda resistencia que pudieran oponer. Vociferas con una firmeza perfeccionada tras años de servicio; tanto aliados como delincuentes te obedecen sin rechistar. Cientos de criminales se han postrado de rodillas y suplicado clemencia al oír tu imperiosa orden de deponer las armas. Todos fueron sometidos a un implacable juicio sumario.
languages.original_text: An Arbitrator's order is the voice of the Lex Imperialis. Your squad was in charge of collecting the sacred tithe from debtors and suppressing any resistance shown. Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making allies and offenders alike comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

traits.locale_text: La orden de un Arbitrator es la voz de la Lex Imperialis. Tu escuadra se encargaba de cobrar el sagrado diezmo a los deudores y de sofocar toda resistencia que pudieran oponer. Vociferas con una firmeza perfeccionada tras años de servicio; tanto aliados como delincuentes te obedecen sin rechistar. Cientos de criminales se han postrado de rodillas y suplicado clemencia al oír tu imperiosa orden de deponer las armas. Todos fueron sometidos a un implacable juicio sumario.

languages.text: 法务官的命令就是帝国法典的具现。你的队伍长期肩负着向帝国臣民征收神圣什一税的使命，无情镇压任何胆敢反抗帝国权威的叛逆者。经年累月的法务部服役经历，使你雷霆般的声音中蕴含着不可动摇的意志，无论是盟友士兵还是叛乱分子，都会在你威严的敕令前臣服。当你震彻云霄的招降命令响彻战场时，数以百计的囚徒跪伏在地，祈求饶命，而这些罪人最终都受到了迅捷、严酷的审判。
languages.original_text: An Arbitrator's order is the voice of the Lex Imperialis. Your squad was in charge of collecting the sacred tithe from debtors and suppressing any resistance shown. Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making allies and offenders alike comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.

languages.text: Yargıcı'nın hükmü, Lex İmperialis'in sesidir. Mangan, borçlulardan kutsal aşar toplamak ve ortaya çıkabilecek her türlü direnişi bastırmakla görevliydi. Yılların hizmetiyle bilenen sarsılmaz bir güvenle, ağzından kükrercesine çıkan emirler hem dost hem de faillerde itaat duygusu uyandırır. İradeni dile getirdiğinde kimse itiraz etmeye cüret edemez. Yüzlerce suçlu, teslim olmalarını buyuran ve kulakları sağır eden sesini duymalarıyla dizleri üzerine çöküp merhamet diledi. Hepsinin cezası da gözlerinin yaşına bakılmadan hızlıca kesildi.
languages.original_text: An Arbitrator's order is the voice of the Lex Imperialis. Your squad was in charge of collecting the sacred tithe from debtors and suppressing any resistance shown. Your commands bellow with unshakeable confidence honed by years of service, making allies and offenders alike comply, for none dare protest when you give voice to your will. Hundreds of criminals have fallen to their knees and begged for mercy upon hearing your deafening order to surrender. All of them faced swift and harsh judgement.
